rules_text:
Legendary creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever a legendary creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
flavor_text:
[i]“We must not forget that while we expand our borders out there, we fight a silent war in here. The Empress reaches too far.”
—Baron Tilray, [/i]Empire Ascended[i][/i]
